text: (Napiye!) Ivvetattiliruntu umakku arivikkappattatai nir etuttotuviraka innum tolukaiyai nilai niruttuviraka niccayamaka tolukai (manitarai) manakketanavarraiyum timaiyaiyum vittu vilakkum. Niccayamaka, allahvin tikru (tiyanam) mikavum perita(na caktiya)kum; anriyum allah ninkal ceypavarrai nankarikiran
